define: [Only for ID mart seller] This API allows sellers to set up their packaging fee info. Through this API, sellers can enable or disable packaging fees, and if enabled, specify the dimensions of the packaging and the associated fee. This ensures that sellers can configure their shipping costs accurately based on their packaging requirements.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Indicates whether the seller has enabled or disabled the packaging fee configuration.

True: The seller charges a packaging fee.

False: The seller does not charge a packaging fee.

","name":"enable","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":"True","key":"pXiRDbm"},{"description":"

Required if enabled is set to True.

","name":"dimension","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"ZCYNknG","children":[{"description":"

The length of the packaging in centimetres (cm).

","name":"length","sample":"15","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"MXbkXSw"},{"description":"

","name":"width","sample":"15","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"HAiWfBw"},{"description":"

The height of the packaging in centimetres (cm).

","name":"height","sample":"15","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"JWXSdN"}]},{"description":"

Required if enabled is set to True.

","name":"packaging_fee","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"YYahefK","children":[{"description":"

The packaging fee price in your region's local currency.

For SG/MY/BR/MX seller: Sellers can set the price with two decimal place, other regions can only set the price as an integer.

","name":"value","sample":"100.00","type":"float","required":"True","key":"FJMakpk"}]}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"
